original_text: Nebuzaradan took hold of all those people. He brought them to the king of Babylon at Riblah, in the Hamath region.
korean_text: 시위대장 느부사라단이 그들을 사로잡아 가지고 립나 바벨론 왕에게 나아가매

sentences.original_text: Nebuzaradan took hold of all those people.
He brought them to the king of Babylon
at Riblah, in the Hamath region.
